empty.noTasks: No tasks found for this project.

dialog.title: Rebase Task Attempt
dialog.description: Choose a new base branch to rebase this task attempt onto.

dialog.title: Change target branch
dialog.description: Choose a new target branch for the task attempt.

preview.title: Preview
preview.selectAttempt: Select an attempt to see preview

buildingAlert.title: Starting dev server...
buildingAlert.description: Your application is building. This may take a moment depending on your project size and dependencies.

troubleAlert.title: Preview not ready yet
troubleAlert.description: The dev server is taking longer than expected. Here are some things to check:
troubleAlert.item1: Check if the dev server started successfully - there may be build errors or missing dependencies.
troubleAlert.item2: Verify your dev server prints the URL and port in the format
troubleAlert.item2Suffix: (this is how we detect it's running).
troubleAlert.item3: If you haven't already, install the Web Companion for click-to-edit functionality:

noServer.title: No dev server running
noServer.startPrompt: Please start a dev server to see the preview
noServer.setupPrompt: To use the live preview and click-to-edit, please add a dev server script to this project.
noServer.companionPrompt: For click-to-edit functionality, add the browser companion to your project.

diff.noChanges: No changes have been made yet

processes.selectAttempt: Select an attempt to view execution processes.
processes.errorLoadingUpdates: Failed to load live updates for processes.
processes.noProcesses: No execution processes found for this attempt.
processes.deletedTooltip: Deleted by restore: timeline was restored to a checkpoint and later executions were removed
processes.errorLoadingDetails: Failed to load process details. Please try again.

toolbar.startFirstAttempt: Start your first attempt to begin working on this task

attempt.devScriptMissingTooltip: To start the dev server, add a dev script to this project

merge.title: Merge and complete task
merge.description: This will merge your changes from the task branch into the target branch. Your work will be integrated and the task can be marked as complete.
merge.conflictWarning: Both you and the target branch have modified the same files. Manual conflict resolution may be required.

createPr.title: Create pull request and share work
createPr.description: This will push your changes to the remote repository and create a pull request for team review.
createPr.steps: 1. Push to remote branch, 2. Create PR with task details, 3. Notify team
createPr.conflictWarning: Your changes conflict with the target branch. Resolve conflicts before creating PR.

push.title: Push updates to pull request
push.description: This will push your latest changes to the existing pull request.
push.conflictWarning: Your changes conflict with the target branch. Resolve conflicts before pushing.

rebase.title: Rebase and update with latest changes
rebase.description: This will rebase your task branch onto the latest target branch. Your commits will be replayed on top of the target branch's latest changes.
rebase.conflictWarning: The target branch has changes that may conflict with your work. You may need to resolve conflicts during rebase.

tooltips.approve: Marks task as complete (no code changes to merge)
tooltips.approveMerge: Merges {{count}} commits to {{branch}} and marks task complete

createAttemptDialog.title: Create Attempt
createAttemptDialog.description: Start a new attempt with a coding agent. A git worktree and task branch will be created.
createAttemptDialog.error: Failed to create attempt. Please try again.

taskFormDialog.noProfiles: No executor profiles configured. Please configure in

executorProfileSelector.disabledProviderTooltip: Cannot change provider while processes are running

companion.title: Automagik Forge Companion Point-and-Click
companion.description: Click any UI component in the preview window to select it precisely. The coding agent receives exact DOM selectors and component hierarchy, eliminating ambiguous feedback.

installation.title: Dev Server & Companion Installation
installation.description: Set a dev server command for previews, with a setup script configurable in settings. Use a coding agent to automatically install the Automagik Forge web companion.

codeReview.title: Built-in Code Review
codeReview.description: Add line-specific comments directly in the diffs view with the plus icon. All feedback is collected and sent as a complete review to the coding agent.

pullRequest.title: Create PR from Task
pullRequest.description: Merge your changes or create pull requests directly from task attempts. The PR dialog pre-fills title and description from your task details for streamlined workflows.
